ModMetaData.name: [KV] Infinite Storage
ModMetaData.author: Kiame Vivacity
ModMetaData.description:
Got energy? Need storage space? Infinite Storage is right for you!
The amount of energy required is based off the weight of the stored items in Infinite Storage. I am currently tweaking energy/storage ratio and welcome input as I experiment. I have also made the ratio adjustable in Mod Settings.
There are two 'specialty' storage units: Body Parts and Textiles. These units are capable of storing Body Parts & Medicine and Leather/Wool at without energy.
